TopicTitle: Could Kerbin be a moon of jool and not suffer a collision?

Articles.Content: BTW Mun and Minmus are in the outskirts of the joolian system. Minmus orbits the Mun.

I don't think Minmus could orbit the Mun. That would be like a binary moon system, which would eventually:

1) Crash both moons into Jool.

2) Fling them out of the Jool system.

I'm no physicist, but the Jool system looks like it would be very fragile IRL.

In-game, you could make Jool orbit Gilly, so I don't see any problems with that.

In case you want to play-test your question

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63536-0-23-Alternis-Kerbol-Release-thread-v0-0-Dec-25-Mind-the-bugs
